sentences.english: A little monk who is not old enough to get ordained is called a 'sami. '
sentences.chinese: 小和尚还不到受戒年龄，就叫做“沙弥”。

sentences.english: "As used by the IDF" is a big selling-point, says Mr Shamir.
sentences.chinese: 沙弥尔也说“每年来自国防军的采购是一个大单。”

sentences.english: A little monk who is not old enough to get ordained is called a  novice monk.
sentences.chinese: 小和尚还不到受戒年龄，就叫做“沙弥”。

sentences.english: Seven years, the so-called law by shramanera precepts plunge in lausanne.
sentences.chinese: 七岁受沙弥戒，法号称洛桑扎华。

sentences.english: This is novice nun Qin Cheng, Jin Shao to tie dharma affinity with the assembly.
sentences.chinese: 这里是沙弥尼亲乘，近绍来和大家结法缘。

sentences.english: My friend Sammi used to be a total zit face, but now she"s got great skin."
sentences.chinese: 我朋友沙弥以前满脸豆花，但是她现在皮肤很好。

sentences.english: The mountains are a small temple, the temple has a novice monk.
sentences.chinese: 山上有座小庙，庙里有个沙弥。

sentences.english: Spontaneously, he used mud to block the lives of water and thus, saved the lives of the ants .
sentences.chinese: 小沙弥急忙用泥土堵住雨水，而救了一群蚂蚁。

sentences.english: He did this so at least the little sami could die in his own parents' home.
sentences.chinese: 他这么做是让小沙弥至少可以死在自己家里。

definition: lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
monk (Sanskrit: Sramana, originally refers to north India)/Buddhist monk
Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
